channel.title: lib/pq on Dev & Chill
channel.description: Recent content in lib/pq on Dev & Chill

item.title: Go - lib/pq or pgx - which performs better?
item.description: Some days ago a coworker of mine linked me to the source code of Google’s exposure notifications API and of course is a good chance to see how Google is doing Go related codebases. Continuing with the topic of Postgres and benchmarking, I decided to check out how Postgres configuration was done and this line got my attention: import ( ... "github.com/jackc/pgx/v4/pgxpool" ) What is pgx, and why should we care?
